Subject: Completely Random Guide to Cocktail Crafting
Description: Are you a responsible adult, over the age of 21, who has never had anything more complex or interesting to drink than a rum and coke?  Are you an adult who adores rum and coke, but are looking to make one better?  Are you interested in trying new things?  Do you want to just get free drink samples?  Sign up at Ops!  Speakers include:Nathan Balyeat, Olesh Hotra, Cameron Taylor - Track: Food, After Dark  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
